https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cswiNfnzKyqJZkrgo5nh89ILVlA.jpg Three sisters, all adrift and in crisis, reunite at their childhood home as their domineering mother arranges a big birthday. But as the festivities come to an end, repressed conflicts rise to the surface. Old wounds are opened and a new family is born. Blondie
